content.title: Solaris
content.description: This is a project I have been wanting to do for a while. I made an illustration of the solar system some time before and wanted to make something more interactive. I learned a lot about using the html canvas and making animations via paper.js.

content.title: Profile picture
content.description: I have seen this style some times with other people on the internet and decided I wanted it too. I started with an image of my face and drew the outlines. Then I filled the shapes with different colors. I used darker shades for depth and added shadows. I first made it in PNG but later converted to SVG.

content.title: Picturer
content.description: I wanted to learn to work with canvas and thought it would be fun to make a profile picture creator.

content.title: Presentation genes
content.description: I gave a presentation about the editing of genes. We had an discussion about the topic with the class.

content.title: Boarding screen
content.description: This was my concept for a boarding screen.

content.title: Invisible
content.description: I had to make an illustration with the theme invisible.

content.title: Photography lesson
content.description: I had a lesson about photography. I learned about things like exposure.

content.title: T-Shirt
content.description: I made a t-shirt for a song by Bo Burnham. The song is called [#deep](https://youtu.be/RUBjHPYH8Rs).

content.title: Portfolio
content.description: This portfolio you're viewing is a project too. I made this as my final project for the school year using PHP. I later converted it to Node myself.
